segments.name: lineItemIdentifier
segments.description: The line item identifier begins with 001 and is incremented by one each time record SE40 is repeated.

segments.name: countryOfOrigin
segments.description: The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) country code representing the country of origin. Valid ISO codes are listed in Appendix B of this publication.

segments.name: commercialInvoiceDescription
segments.description: A clear description of the commercial invoice line item in English. Broad, generalized language is unacceptable, as are tariff descriptions. Commercial description is not the same as the Harmonized Tariff description. Provide the description according to other agency instructions.
